snippet: The layoffs included about 550 teachers — from schools that are closing and struggling academically — along with teacher assistants, bus aides, custodians and others.
abstract: Chicago Public Schools lays off nearly 850 employees, hours after identifying $52 million in administrative and operational cuts to help close estimated $1 billion deficits in coming fiscal year.
lead_paragraph: The layoffs included about 550 teachers — from schools that are closing and struggling academically — along with teacher assistants, bus aides, custodians and others.

headline.main: Chicago Public School System Lays Off 850 in Move to Cut Budget
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Chicago Public School System Lays Off 850 In Move To Cut Budget
